name: Mini Minos Labyrinth - Post Jam
description:
Mini Minos Labyrinth is a game jam game where you are trapped in King Minos' labyrinth and must level up to defeat the Minotaur. The game is focused on combat and features the fearsome bull demon that guards the maze. You must gather experience to defeat the Minotaur and earn experience points to level up and gain new abilities. Mini Minos Labyrinth offers a challenging gameplay experience where defeating the Minotaur is your ultimate goal.

This is an updated version of this game. It is short 5 to 10 minutes play of 1 dungeon. I might use the system for later project if comment from this are good enough.
